kv22.8:1.3: Citte mahāpathavī saṇṭhāti, mahāsamuddo saṇṭhāti, sinerupabbatarājā saṇṭhāti, āpo saṇṭhāti, tejo saṇṭhāti, vāyo saṇṭhāti, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatayo saṇṭhahantīti?
kv22.8:2.8: “ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṃ aparibhinnaṃ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
kv22.8:2.9: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṃ aparibhinnaṃ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
kv22.8:2.10: Yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattikañceva cakkhuṃ aparibhinnaṃ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṃ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
kv22.8:3.9: “ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
kv22.8:3.10: ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
kv22.8:3.11: yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattiko ceva kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṃ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
kv22.8:4.4: Sabbe dhammā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammāti?
